description:
in the style of c.1760-70; maple stock; brass mounts; relief carved; on top of butt: image of man with headdress and two tomahawks above two crossed cannons. 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
marks: \"1964\", etched on top of barrel \"E. Lanning\", etched on top of barrel
title: "Genesis" American-Style Flintlock Longrifle
